styles: @import url(https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Roboto:100,100i,300,300i,400,400i,500,500i,700,700i,900,900i);body{background-color:#f7f7f7;font-family:Roboto,sans-serif;color:#333}body.dashboard{background-color:#000}body.dashboard .site-container .component.outlet{background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);box-shadow:none}body.dashboard .c3 line,body.dashboard .c3 path{fill:none;stroke:grey}body.dashboard .c3 text{fill:grey}.blur{-webkit-filter:blur(10px);filter:blur(10px)}a{transition:color 80ms}a:hover{text-decoration:none}.min-width-250{min-width:250px}.site-container .component{padding:10px;margin:10px}.site-container .component.sidebar{margin-right:0;margin-left:0}.site-container .component.outlet{transition:background .5s}h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6{font-weight:100}.inverse.color{color:#f7f7f7}.inverse hr{border-top-color:rgba(247,247,247,.5)}.inverse .btn{color:#f7f7f7}.alert.alert-danger{background-color:#bc0000;color:#f7f7f7;border:1px solid #a20000}.alert.alert-success{background-color:#4cae4c;color:#f7f7f7;border:1px solid #449d44}.id-col{width:200px}.table-hover tbody tr{transition:background-color 80ms}.table-hover tbody tr:nth-child(even){background-color:rgba(1,87,155,.1)}.table-hover tbody tr:hover{background-color:#01579b;color:#ffc107}.is-sticky{z-index:99999}.community-table .body,.community-table .header{font-size:.8em}.community-table .header{font-weight:700;margin-bottom:5px;border-bottom:1px solid #cecece}.community-table .body{border-radius:3px;margin-bottom:3px}.community-table .body.status-danger{color:#b71c1c}.community-table .body:hover{background-color:#01579b!important;color:#f7f7f7!important}.community-table .body.link{cursor:pointer}.community-table.alt .row.body:nth-child(even){background-color:#fff}.col-w-300{width:300px}.col-w-250{width:250px}.col-w-200{width:200px}.col-w-150{width:150px}.col-w-100{width:100px}.col-w-50{width:50px}.form-control{padding:0 5px}select.form-control:not([size]):not([multiple]){height:calc(1.65rem + 1px)}.lazy.show{display:initial}.lazy.hide{display:none!important}.spin{display:block;-webkit-animation:1s linear infinite spin;animation:1s linear infinite spin}@-webkit-keyframes spin{from{-webkit-transform:rotate(0);transform:rotate(0)}to{-webkit-transform:rotate(360deg);transform:rotate(360deg)}}@keyframes spin{from{-webkit-transform:rotate(0);transform:rotate(0)}to{-webkit-transform:rotate(360deg);transform:rotate(360deg)}}.LoadingNotification{left:0;position:fixed;text-align:center;top:0;width:100%;z-index:9999;min-height:100%;background-color:rgba(0,30,54,.95)}.LoadingNotification-anim{height:160px;overflow:visible;position:fixed;top:50%;left:50%;width:160px;-webkit-transform:translateX(-50%) translateY(-50%);transform:translateX(-50%) translateY(-50%);zoom:2;-moz-transform:scale(1.8);display:block}.LoadingNotification-anim .circular{height:160px;position:relative;width:160px;-webkit-animation:2s linear infinite loadingrotate;animation:2s linear infinite loadingrotate}.LoadingNotification-anim .path{stroke-dasharray:1,100;stroke-dashoffset:0;stroke-linecap:round;-webkit-animation:1.5s ease-in-out infinite loadingdash,6s ease-in-out infinite color;animation:1.5s ease-in-out infinite loadingdash,6s ease-in-out infinite color}@-webkit-keyframes color{0%,100%{stroke:#00be96}40%{stroke:#e64b41}66%{stroke:#46b9b9}80%,90%{stroke:#ffbe00}}@keyframes color{0%,100%{stroke:#00be96}40%{stroke:#e64b41}66%{stroke:#46b9b9}80%,90%{stroke:#ffbe00}}@-webkit-keyframes loadingrotate{100%{-webkit-transform:rotate(360deg);transform:rotate(360deg)}}@keyframes loadingrotate{100%{-webkit-transform:rotate(360deg);transform:rotate(360deg)}}@-webkit-keyframes loadingdash{0%{stroke-dasharray:1,200;stroke-dashoffset:0}50%{stroke-dasharray:89,200;stroke-dashoffset:-35}100%{stroke-dasharray:89,200;stroke-dashoffset:-124}}@keyframes loadingdash{0%{stroke-dasharray:1,200;stroke-dashoffset:0}50%{stroke-dasharray:89,200;stroke-dashoffset:-35}100%{stroke-dasharray:89,200;stroke-dashoffset:-124}}

.subHeader{background-color:#00b3b3;color:#f7f7f7;text-align:left;padding-top:5px;padding-bottom:5px}.pop-background .pop-container .pop-alert .subHeader.isError{background-color:material-color("red", "800")}.pop-background .pop-container .pop-alert .body{background-color:#f7f7f7;min-height:100px}.pop-background .pop-container .pop-alert .footer{text-align:right;background-color:#eaeaea;padding:10px}.pop-background .pop-container .pop-alert .footer a:first-child{margin-right:5px}@-webkit-keyframes
